content:
ScrollButton Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of scroll arrow to draw on a scroll bar.

In this Article

public enum ScrollButton
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ScrollButton

Remarks

This enumeration is used by DrawScrollButton.

Fields

Down

A down-scroll arrow.
Left

A left-scroll arrow.
Max

A maximum-scroll arrow.
Min

A minimum-scroll arrow.
Right

A right-scroll arrow.
Up

An up-scroll arrow.
